title: Drawing, "The Walking Wounded", 1861–62
medium: Pen and brown ink, graphite on light-brown wove paper
creditline: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
description: Horizontal loosely drawn sketch of four soldiers: three holding muskets upright and one, at left with a beard and moustache, holding his rifle at his side. The soldier at right is smaller than the others and looks right. The middle soldier looks left.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "The Walking Wounded", 1861–62.
1861–62. Pen and brown ink, graphite on light-brown wove paper. Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.. 1912-12-121.
